job.title: Data Engineer
job.description: Manage the company enterprise data warehouse (EDW). Ensure data is sourced appropriately and data is cleaned, validated, reconciled and “ready to use” for analytics. Lead data governance efforts. This role is preferably located in the Leihi Utah area. We may consider Remote worker candidates who can be in Lehi UT on a frequent and as need basis. Preference is to be on premise at company HQ Physical Demands and Work Environment  The physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this position. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the functions. While performing the duties of this position, the employee is regularly required to talk or hear. The employee frequently is required to use hands or fingers, handle or feel objects, tools, or controls. The employee is occasionally required to stand; walk; sit; and reach with hands and arms.
